ValidationRule.description: Prevents users manually changing the LOA's status to anything beyond "Signed"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", ISCHANGED( MainLOAStatus__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL(MainLOAStatus__c, "Sent to Provider"), ISPICKVAL(MainLOAStatus__c, "Within SLA"), ISPICKVAL(MainLOAStatus__c, "Outside SLA"), ISPICKVAL(MainLOAStatus__c, "Specialist Reviewed"), ISPICKVAL(MainLOAStatus__c, "LOA Analysis"), ISPICKVAL(MainLOAStatus__c, "Completed") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot manually move the LOA to this status. If you have already sent the LOA to the provider, start at stage "Signed" and work through the process.
